Ensure posts linked to a user can be retrieved

testsuite.name: UserIntegrationSpec

testcase.name: Saving our first user to the database
Updating a saved user changes its properties
Deleting an existing user removes it from the database
Saving a user with invalid properties causes an error
Recovering from a failed save by fixing invalid properties
